attributes.action: Remoove ALL road bumps on the UK and territories
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The reason being they have a tendency to give people bad backs and other medical problems. It is impossible to driver over one at 30 mph which you are supposed to be able to. Unless the government are going to pay for our suspension which will inevitable fail sooner or later, these need to be aboloshed now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
